markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vampire-Fang Morningstar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1888)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 38 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_ is studded with teeth pulled from a [vampire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=97), which usually requires an animate donor, given vampires' tendency to turn to dust when destroyed.

<document level="2" id="action-1582" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include teeth from a vampire.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vampire-Fang Morningstar
